entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
